attributes.action: There should be a parliamentry debate about the Devnwall constituancy. Before Boundaries Commission decides/judges!
attributes.additional_details: There are many reasons why. Cornwall's culture, make up; I could go on forever; When will parliament listen to Cornwall. Or consider. We get lip service even from the PM. We should be able to give further evidence too.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England which is independant of Government. The Boundary Commission are currently conducting a consultation into their latest Boundary review and would wlecome input from members of the public. Please visit the Boundary Commission website for more information.
